Reviews.Title: Buena cámara buen precio
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Chalo"
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm marca reconocida por años por sus cámara fotográficas, la calidad de imágenes que saca esta cámara son muy buenas, hay que leer el manual ahí esta muy bien expresado e indicado todos los mecanismos y facilidades que brinda este producto.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Romby
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are not photographers, but wanted a nice camera.  We had purchased several cheap digital pocket cameras over the years and all lasted a year or so.  We decided to spend a few extra dollars and purchase this camera and are very glad we did.  It takes great photos, even at a distance.  Like I said, we are not photographers, but the pics this camera takes makes us look like one.  It took about 2-3 days of steady use to understand most of the functions, some are still complicated to us, but we'll figure it out as we go along.  This is a very nice camera that takes amazing photos.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME DEAL
Reviews.Author: sw
Reviews.Content: Everything came in GREAT condition. The product shiped fast! The Camera quality is unbelievable! I have never had a camera that took such great photo's. I had purchased this camera to take up photography as a hobby and I was very impressed with how easy and clear all the photos have came out. I had read a review from a man about this camera saying that he could see all the individual hairs on his cat; He was right! Every hair on my cats body was clearly visible.I have mainly used the camera for memories of my 2 yeaar old son and I have been able to catch some awsome clear/focused shots. I would recamend this camera and even buying it in this package.

Reviews.Title: Fuji FinePix HS20
Reviews.Author: Picman
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. Great picture taking, ease of use, lots of features. Purchased it from Big Value, and down to the customer service everything was great about camera.

Reviews.Title: KUDOS
Reviews.Author: North Idaho Don "Idaho Walker"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product for the money - still working on my learning curve regarding all the features this great camera offers.  Particularly impressed with the expedient/early delivery of this great camera.  Your affiliate store did a great job with this produce/transaction.

ProductInfo.Features:
16-megapixel EXR-CMOS sensor deliver amazing pictures in fast-shooting and low-light situations.
Capture up to 11 frames/second at 8-megapixel resolution. Full 1080p HD movie capture; mini-HDMI output.
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (included). 30x wide-angle optical zoom lens; 16 million effective pixels; 1/2 inch BSI EXR CMOS sensor; Advanced Anti Blur; Hot Shoe
3.0 inch LCD display with electronic viewfinder; Full HD video 1080p with stereo sound.
16 million effective pixels; 1/2 inch BSI EXR CMOS sensor; 30x optical zoom lens; Advanced Anti Blur; Hot Shoe
